mapper.sql: id, username, password, nickname, platform, create_date, modify_date, deleted
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
username,
password,
nickname,
platform,
create_date,
modify_date,
deleted,
profile,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{platform,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
profile = #{profile,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, profile = #{profile,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
